com.taheris.gameoflife

Class GameOfLifeView

  • java.lang.Object
    • SurfaceView
      • com.taheris.gameoflife.GameOfLifeView

  • public class GameOfLifeView
extends SurfaceView
    Purpose:
    Controls the screen rendering
    Description:
    Canvas updates are done in a thread separate from the main GUI
    Version:
    23 Jan 2013
    Author:
    Shaun Taheri
